Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
Heey, I can't verify any web events on your platform, even though everything seems fine in the dev tools. Could you help me, please?
Hey there! Let's see if we can figure this out together. Could you let me know which tracking platform or service you're using for the web events? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Got it! For custom integrations, it's important to ensure that the postback is set up correctly. Here's a general guide on integrating a NewsBreak Postback:

1. Add the Callback Parameter to Your Ad's Landing Page URL by inserting `__CALLBACK_PARAM__` into the landing page URL of your ad.
2. Verify if the custom event is placed correctly and fires as expected.
3. Use any available test features in your platform to load and verify the event.

If everything seems fine but you're still facing issues, please check if your tracking platform is recording clicks and conversions properly. If not, you might want to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com with details like click ID and timestamp for further assistance.

For more detailed steps, you can refer to this article: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). Let me know if there's anything else I can help with!

To add the callback parameter to your ad's landing page URL, you'll need to insert `__CALLBACK_PARAM__` into the URL. This parameter is used to track events back to NewsBreak. Here's a quick step-by-step:

1. Locate the landing page URL of your ad.
2. Insert `__CALLBACK_PARAM__` at the appropriate place in the URL where you want to capture callback data.

This setup helps ensure that events are tracked correctly on your platform. If you need more detailed instructions, feel free to check out our guide: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback). Let me know if there's anything else you need help with!
